SELECT t.*, t1.tag_key as tagKey, t2.tag_name as tagName, u.name as user, sg.name as groupName, t3.script as rule FROM server_result t left join rule_tag_mapping t1 on t1.rule_id = t.rule_id left join rule_tag t2 on t1.tag_key = t2.tag_key left join server_rule t3 on t.rule_id = t3.id left join user u on t.apply_user = u.id left join server s on s.id = t.server_id left join server_group sg on sg.id = s.server_group_id
and t.id = #{request.id}
and LOWER(t.server_name) like CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{request.serverName}),'%')
and LOWER(t.ip) like CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{request.ip}),'%')
and LOWER(t.rule_name) like CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{request.ruleName}),'%')
ORDER BY FIELD(t.result_status, 'APPROVED', 'FINISHED', 'ERROR'), t.is_severity, FIELD(t.type, 'windows', 'linux'), t.ip, FIELD(t.severity, 'HighRisk', 'MediumRisk', 'LowRisk'), t.server_name, t.update_time desc

SELECT t.*, u.name as user, sg.name as groupName, (SELECT count(r.id) FROM server_result r where r.server_id = t.id and r.is_severity is false) as riskSum FROM server t left join server_group sg on sg.id = t.server_group_id left join user u on u.id = t.creator
and t.id = #{request.id}
and LOWER(t.name) like CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{request.name}),'%')
and LOWER(t.ip) like CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{request.ip}),'%')
and LOWER(t.port) like CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{request.port}),'%')
and LOWER(t.user_name) like CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{request.userName}),'%')
ORDER BY t.update_time desc
SELECT concat(t.server_name, ' (', count(t.id), ')') as 'name', count(t.id) as 'value' FROM server_result as t WHERE t.is_severity = 0 GROUP BY t.server_name Limit 10;

SELECT t.server_name as 'product', (SELECT IFNULL(count(t1.id), 0) as High from server_result t1 where t1.server_name = t.server_name and LOWER(t1.severity) = 'highrisk' and t1.is_severity = false) as High, (SELECT IFNULL(count(t1.id), 0) as Medium from server_result t1 where t1.server_name = t.server_name and LOWER(t1.severity) = 'mediumrisk' and t1.is_severity = false) as Medium, (SELECT IFNULL(count(t1.id), 0) as Low from server_result t1 where t1.server_name = t.server_name and LOWER(t1.severity) = 'lowrisk' and t1.is_severity = false) as Low FROM server_result as t GROUP BY t.server_name Limit 10;
SELECT server_name as name FROM server_result GROUP BY server_name LIMIT 10;
select count(t.id) as returnSum FROM server_result t WHERE t.is_severity = false GROUP BY t.server_name LIMIT 10;
